titleStmt.title: The Covenanters catechisme, or, A brief and familiar analysis and exposition of the Covenant first delivered in sundry sermons to a particular congregation : and now resolved into questions and answers for the more publike good / by the same avthor.

notesStmt.note: A catechism in defense of the Solemn League and Covenant.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
